ygData.subject: When Clash tries to fight 2...He can't! The end is near...
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: This post is long, but I was bored. BIC: Deemos then recognized Clash when he detected the sparks of his enemies in Clash. Tarantopulous recognized

OOC: This post is long, but I was bored.

BIC: Deemos then recognized Clash=
 when he detected the sparks of his enemies in Clash. Tarantopulous recogni=
zed Inzola's spark. In Clash? Tarantopulous lunges at Clash and pummels him=
 with forearms and punches. Clash stepped backwards, finding himself unable=
 to put up with Tarantopulous' onslaught. Perplex walks up behind Clash and=
 hits him in the back, knocking him over. Tarantopulous instantly ran over =
and started to kick away at Clash on the ground. Clash crawled, trying to g=
et away, then took to the sky, flying above the 2. Neither Tarantopulous no=
r Perplex could fly. Tarantopulous aimed up at Clash with a very tiny pisto=
l that he had trouble holding.

Clash: You fight me...2 on 1? Cowardly! Tha=
t's the only word I have for you!

Perplex: Attacking an innocent being, th=
at's cowardly.

Tarantopulous aims dead on at Clash, although Clash doesn't=
 realize it.

Clash: I'm just trying to earn a living in this world!

Perpl=
ex: So is everyone else!

Clash: Are you saying that what I do is wrong?

P=
erplex: Yes!

Tarantopulous: Yes.

Clash: Ooh! I'm sc--

Clash didn't get t=
o finish before Tarantopulous fired, blasting both of his thrusters clean o=
ff and dropping him to the ground. Deemos nodded in approval of Tarantopulo=
us' skills. Clash found himself unable to fly and climbed to his feet. Tara=
ntopulous came up close. Clash aimed his hand at Tarantopulous, ready to fi=
re his deadly weapons. Tarantopulous pulls a sword from seemingly nowhere a=
nd cuts off Clash's arm.

Clash: I just grew that back!

Clash aimed his ot=
her hand, but at the last second punched. Tarantopulous caught his fist and=
 ripped his arm off. Clash felt no pain through this and just laughed. Tara=
ntopulus stepped backwards and leaned on his sword.

Clash: You fool! I'll =
just grow them back! You're worthless! You think you're so good just becaus=
e of this? And you say I am wrong? What's the matter? You don't want to hit=
 me when I'm defenseless?

Clash was preparing another weapon, which he wou=
ld fire from a hidden cannon that came from his back. Perplex walked up beh=
ind Clash.

Clash: Come on you coward, hit me! I dare you! Hit me!

Perplex=
 grabbed hold of Clash's head from behind and fired a beam that disintegrat=
ed his head. Clash's body turns around and faces Perplex. Perlex and Tarant=
opulous both move at the same time and slice Clash in half. He still moves =
about. Tarantopulous and Perplex start slicing up the pieces but they keep =
resuming life again and again. While the 2 kept destroying the pieces only =
to have the smaller pieces move about still, Deemos walked forward, located=
 one piece of Clash's chestplate that wasn't moving. Deemos stomped it, a a=
 sparkling but tiny explosion crackled under his foot and a pop was heard. =
The pieces of Clash's body stomped moving. Perplex and Tarantopulous looked=
 to Deemos. Deemos turned his back towards them and started to walk away.

=
Deemos: See you some other time, Taran.

Sparks started flying away from Cl=
ash's body.

Perplex: Whoa!

Tarantopulous followed one of them, turning ba=
ck to Perplex and thanking him, then following the spark again. Perplex loo=
ked at the pieces of Clash and then started back towards Windlord's base...=
